resources.string: Scan QR code to connect with peer.
Connect to this address in your browser

Send clipboard between your phone,
desktop or another phone.

Turn service on and just copy and paste.
Scan this code in %s App running on\nanother device to get connected
QR code You have just scanned does not contain %1$s connection information.\n\nPlease, scan a QR code in %1$s App that is running on another device to get connected.
%s host is unreachable. Please, check your network connection and try again.
